mapper.update: update t_manager set user_code = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_password = #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cellphone = #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, locked = #{locked,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, insert_time = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, user_code, user_name, user_password, email, cellphone, locked, insert_time, update_time from t_manager where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, user_code, user_name, user_password, email, cellphone, locked, insert_time, update_time from t_manager
